events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report about late shipment and tracking problems.
A customer support agent specializing in shipping issues has been assigned to handle this delivery delay case.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand that your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the current status with our carrier?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield, IL 62704.
Thank you for the information. I've contacted the shipping company and they reported a delay due to weather. Your package should arrive within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update. I understand delays happen, so I'll wait a few more days as you suggested. Thanks for following up.
Glad I could assist. We will keep monitoring the shipment and notify you if any further delays occur.
Just checking in to confirm that your package has been delivered. Please let us know if everything arrived as expected.
